subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin, who has five top-10 finishes this year, has 55 Sprint Cup pole positions, including one at Michigan International Speedway after a 199.706 m.p.h. qualifying run.
snippet: Mark Martin, who has five top-10 finishes this year, has 55 Sprint Cup pole positions, including one at Michigan International Speedway after a 199.706 m.p.h. qualifying run.
